00028 #ifndef __HardwareIndexBuffer__
00029 #define __HardwareIndexBuffer__
00030 
00031 // Precompiler options
00032 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00033 #include "OgreHardwareBuffer.h"
00034 #include "OgreSharedPtr.h"
00035 
00036 namespace Ogre {
00037     class HardwareBufferManagerBase;
00038 
00046     class _OgreExport HardwareIndexBuffer : public HardwareBuffer
00047     {
00048         public:
00049             enum IndexType {
00050                 IT_16BIT,
00051                 IT_32BIT
00052             };
00053 
00054         protected:
00055             HardwareBufferManagerBase* mMgr;
00056             IndexType mIndexType;
00057             size_t mNumIndexes;
00058             size_t mIndexSize;
00059 
00060         public:
00062             HardwareIndexBuffer(HardwareBufferManagerBase* mgr, IndexType idxType, size_t numIndexes, HardwareBuffer::Usage usage,
00063                 bool useSystemMemory, bool useShadowBuffer);
00064             ~HardwareIndexBuffer();
00066             HardwareBufferManagerBase* getManager() const { return mMgr; }
00068             IndexType getType(void) const { return mIndexType; }
00070             size_t getNumIndexes(void) const { return mNumIndexes; }
00072             size_t getIndexSize(void) const { return mIndexSize; }
00073 
00074             // NB subclasses should override lock, unlock, readData, writeData
00075     };
00076 
00077 
00079     class _OgreExport HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr : public SharedPtr<HardwareIndexBuffer>
00080     {
00081     public:
00082         HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr() : SharedPtr<HardwareIndexBuffer>() {}
00083         explicit HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr(HardwareIndexBuffer* buf);
00084     };
00087 }
00088 #endif
